name: AGAIN
description:
Again is a simple 3D platform jumping game for developed and published by Redpix Games LLC.
At the time of release, the game contains 5 Levels of linearly increasing difficulty and the audio tracks created from scratch for this game specifically. Additional content may be available in the future.
The game records in what amount of time you finished a particular level and the score for all the levels are summed up.
- Menu Navigation -
Move:
--- WASD Keys
Look:
--- Mouse
Jump:
--- Space Key
Select Level:
--- Hold Left Mouse Button
- In Game Controls -
Move:
--- WASD Keys
Look:
--- Mouse
Jump:
--- Space Key
Focus on the Next Platform:
--- F Key
Please enjoy the game and feel free to leave a review!
Hmm, I wonder what those notes mean and who left them there?
